name: Cloverheart
description:
Live like a rat. Experience romance. Rat-mance? Woo your girlfriend with a bouquet of clovers.

Arrow keys/wasd to move, trigger dialogue, and advance dialogue.

Bitsy game made for bitsy rat jam. Music by my girlfriend pegasnow. Special thanks to Borksy and Add Bitsy Audio for making it function. 

Shout-outs to my friends in Studio Aurora for their support!
